comments:
build: 20070612-1544
JVM: IBM JRE 1.5 SR4
with the default library OpenUP, click the DP, and open its Activity Diagram, only the title of the editor is shown, see the screenshot
more information:
RHEL5 with IBM JRE and SUN JRE 1.5 could not open AD
no this problem in RHEL4.

From the following exception, look like RHEL5 installation is missing library "libstdc++.so.5" which is needed for fontManager. Please check your installation.
Thanks

java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: fontmanager (libstdc++.so.5: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibraryWithPath(ClassLoader.java:952)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibraryWithClassLoader(ClassLoader.java:921)
	at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:452)
	at sun.security.action.LoadLibraryAction.run(LoadLibraryAction.java:77)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(AccessController.java:193)
	at java.text.Bidi.<clinit>(Bidi.java:79)

I just tested lastest build 0614 with RHEL5 (Server) Vmware session with SUN JRE1.5. And I could open AD fine, 

Please check your RedHat installation again. If you need information on how to get Vmware session, contact me by email. Of course it's very slow compared to having machine installation.
